detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract SplinterFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SplinterFinance.sol#102-224) has payable functions:
	 - SplinterFinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SplinterFinance.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
